name: Infinity Roll
description:
Short information

We make this game in one day (6-7 hours), it is simple idea, objects generates randomly and there are some coins which you can collect and then if you die you will see yor survive time and how much coins you collect.

Objects
  • When you fall down - game restart;
  • When you touch some cube - game restart;
  • When you touch green plate - you become faster for a few seconds;
  • When you touch red plate - you become slower for a few seconds;
  • When you touch to the coin - you gain one point;
Controll

W,A,S,D - movements

Space - jump (not useful)

OUR WEBSITE
